#include<stdio.h>
long long int pow(long long int a,long long int b)
{
    long long int ans=1;
 while(b--)
     {
         ans=ans*a;
     }
     return ans;
}
int main()
{
    int t;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
        long long int n,k,i,a[20]={9,180,2700,36000,450000,5400000,63000000,720000000,8100000000,90000000000,990000000000,10800000000000,117000000000000,1260000000000000,13500000000000000};
        long long int j=0,pos1=0,pos2=0,fin=0,ans=0,x,b[30]={0},c[20]={0};
        scanf("%lld%lld",&n,&k);
        //printf("after scanning\n");
        c[0]=a[0];
        for(i=1;i<=14;i++)
        {
            c[i]=c[i-1]+a[i];
        }
        if(k<=9)
        {
           printf("%lld\n",k);
        }
        else{
        for(i=0;i<=14;i++)
        {
           if(k>=c[i]&&k<=c[i+1])
           {
               pos1=i;
               break;
           }
        }
        long long int cos;
       pos2=k-c[pos1];
       ans=pos2%(pos1+2);
       cos=pos2;
       pos2=pos2/(pos1+2);
       if(pos2==0)
       fin=pow(10,pos1+1)+pos2;
       else if(cos%(pos1+2)==0){
       fin=pow(10,pos1+1)+pos2-1;
        //printf("else if  is %lld  %lld\n",fin,pos2);
       }
       else{
       fin=pow(10,pos1+1)+pos2;
       //printf("else is %lld\n",fin);
       }
       x=fin;
       if(ans==0)
       ans=pos1+2;
       //printf("%lld\n",x);
       j=1;
       while(x)
       {
           b[j++]=x%10;
           x=x/10;
       }
       printf("%lld\n",b[j-ans]);
    }
    }

    return 0;
}
